10.body: I killed a person, for the first time. To my surprise, I didnâ€™t feel guilty. One would panic, or think that they need to hide the body, but the first thing I thought was â€œIâ€™m kind of cool now lolâ€. No one would think of this, if they were the murderer. It was just like, â€œa kid playing with a stick as a swordâ€. First, I need to get out of here. I went to the hallway once more. As I expected, I do not know where I am. So, what should I do hereâ€¦ Thereâ€™s always a chance that I make the protagonist teleport, and just let the world die, but itâ€™s not funny enough. So, Iâ€™ll just walk here. I turned right and walked straight forward. Itâ€™s so long that I even get scared. I walked and walked. But nobody came. I tried to call somebody with a small voice. Still nobody came. I tried to call somebody, shouting. But still, nobody came. I waited for a while.

3.body: Seishousetsu (temporary name) is a web novel series written by a number of students. The story is based in Japan, Tokyo and Tsukuba, to be more specifically. Tsukuba is a city near Tokyo, it's only 300km or so. The story unfolds around a company in Tsukuba.
3.title: Introduction

7.body: Since I was young, I have longed for the cities. I was born and raised in the countryside. In that town, there was no video arcade nor shopping mall. And because of this, I admired cities such as Kyoto or Osaka. In that long list, I especially had one city, the city I wanted to go to for so long. Tokyo. Since the rise of the Edo Shogunate, the city that has kept growing, the city that surpassed even the former capital Kyoto. Tokyo. A place where buildings are tightly packed, and thousands of people are walking to work. A place we can hardly imagine here. I have seen it in textbooks several times, and heard some rumors about it, but I have never been there. I wanted to go, and see the city with my own eyesâ€¦ I tried to go to the city several times until now. But, the train stopping because of the bad weather, or because of electricity problems, I couldnâ€™t go. I didnâ€™t have enough money to travel anymore, and thus, my dreams were at risk of disappearing. I thought that I needed more money to continue to try. So, I decided to search for work in this town. I looked at the job magazines for a while, and found a fine job. Sakuma Construction. Seems like itâ€™s job is mainly cleaning the bike roads. After quickly applying for the job, I got the position soon. It seems hard work, but the salary is high, so I decided to stay. And the next day, the first time, I went to the company. Authors: sungntung, nono

7.title: Chapter 1 The Beginning

8.body: The first job was, just not bad. I even got a mate. But, the salary was a few times less than I heard, and even the correspondences were ambiguous. The company I went to was the so-called â€œBlack companyâ€. After working for a while, I, who couldnâ€™t stand working with such low salary, stole some money from the companyâ€™s cash register, and fled. But the workers there wake up early, so they would notice the flea easily. I must leave for Tokyo by then. First, I went to the nearest station, buying the ticket to Tsukuba Station, where there is a train bound to Tokyo. Stopping by at a store, buying some food and drinks, I hopped on the train. Things went well until Tsukuba Station, but when I was buying the ticket for the train bound to Tokyo, I was called from behind. I looked back, and confirmed that the person who called me was the station staff. Feeling relieved, I answered, â€œWhatâ€™s the matter?â€ â€œWell, I heard that there is a person who stole a companyâ€™s money nearby, and their face in this photo is similar to yours, so I just wanted to have a talk with y..â€ I was starting to run before I finished listening to them. The company is already aware of this. Why..? As I ran, I realized the truth. The story goes back to just after joining the companyâ€¦ â€œSo youâ€™re YÌ´Ì¨Í™Í™Í”ÍÌ“Í˜ÇÌµÌ™Ì–Ì³Í˜áºƒÌ´Ì«Ì¼ÌºÌaÌ´Ì–Ì©Í’Í tÌ¸Ì¯Í“Ì™ÍˆÌšaÌ¸Í‰ÍÍšÌ…ÌÌ“rÌ´ÌœÌ™Ì‰ÍÃ­ÌµÌ§Ì¡Ì», the new member. If you have any questions, feel free to ask me!â€ Since then, I became mates with Motobe. When I told him that the work is too hard, he always cheered me up. I thought he was a good person. Until now, that is. One night, just before bedtime, I told him, â€œI think Iâ€™m going to flee this company..â€ Then, Motobe asked me if work is way too hard. He said that if I say yes, he will help me. I asked him to keep my inexistence as a secret. He agreed with it. To be honest, I was satisfied with it. But it seems that Motobe isnâ€™t on my side. If I thought more deeply that there are no bad rumors in this company.. Now, I am running through the station, heading towards the train to Tokyo. If I take that rapid train, Iâ€™ll arrive at Tokyo easily. Shortly after, my plan was deleted inside my head. Two company guards were waiting for me in front of the train. This is my fault, as I spoke all my plans to Motobe. But still, only two people might not stop me. I ran as soon as the train doors were opened. Before I could say goodbye to this town, I almost tripped. One of the company guards was grabbing my leg. I try to make the guard let go of my leg, but the guard still grabs tight on me. Eventually, more company came at me, and at last, I was taken down by them. Using my last power, I ask the passengers for help. But they ignore me ruthlessly. I get hit by one of the men, but I still ask someone for help. And blacking out, my consciousness falls into the dark. Authors: Ğ¯Ğ³ÑƒÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¥Ğ°Ñ€ÑƒĞºĞ¸ã€nono

9.body: I was sleeping in an unknown room when I woke up. My senses feel a person nearby. My eye catched them as my sight came back. It was Motobe. â€œGood morning.â€ I ask him, â€œWhere is this place?!â€, and he answers. â€œInside the company, of course. Get ready for some talking.â€ As I wake up, I open the door behind me and step through. But the hallway beyond the door was something Iâ€™ve never seen. Is this really the company? â€œMotobe, what is this company for?â€ He just laughs, and says, â€œDo you think Iâ€™ll tell you that easily? What are you doing in the first place, stealing the companyâ€™s money?â€ This conversation will last forever. Well, I did steal the moneyâ€¦ But, in that case, Iâ€™ll flee the company, no matter what. â€œâ€¦Then, letâ€™s have a deal. If you can satisfy me in five minutes, Iâ€™ll help you flee the company. Tell me everything you know about the company.â€ â€œâ€¦â€¦OK.â€ As I say that, I steal the New Nambu M60 from Motobeâ€™s holster, and aim at him. â€œSatisfied? If you can satisfy me in five minutes, I might let you live. Tell me everything about the company.â€ After some silence, I asked him. â€œWho are you?â€œ â€œI, am Motobe, former manager of the External Escapee Management Department.â€ The silence continued after he answered the question. After a while, â€œDid you know that the pistol is actually a lighter?â€ I immediately pulled the trigger to confirm, only to hear the gunshot. â€œAnd, thatâ€™s fake. There was only one live bullet loaded in that gun, and you used it. That means, that there aren't any live ones nâ€¦â€ Then, he stopped moving, just sitting down on the sofa. There wasnâ€™t any second bullet. Red liquid came out from his left chest. And inside, was a 9mm live ammo. Authors: nonoã€Ğ¯Ğ³ÑƒÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¥Ğ°Ñ€ÑƒĞºĞ¸ã€sungntung
